website_summaries.verdict: Excellent stethoscope by a trusted brand with features the competitors can't top – a superior instrument that any medical professional can appreciate.
pros: Offers almost every feature medical professionals need, including clear acoustics, adult/pediatric sides, and tunable diaphragms
Has durable tubing that comes in numerous colors
cons: The earpieces may fit some users a bit loosely
Some faulty stethoscopes have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Respiratory Therapist
customer_reviews.text: I'm an RRT and this stethoscope beats the Cardiology IV! Seriously people, in my career I've owned many stethoscopes, but this one is the best. Lightweight and long enough that I don't have to smell my patients breath when listening to breath sounds, and I can hear the S1 and S2 heart sounds. With vent alarms and monitors going off I can hear faint crackles. You won't be disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Myers

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't post reviews but I always look at them before buying something. I just received my Littmann Classic III and I am in love with it!!! Came well packaged and it's beautiful!! It has very good acoustics and I can't wait to use it during nursing school!! If you're on the fence, don't hesitate. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great quality stethoscope for a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: As a field paramedic, I've never seen the need to buy a $150-$200 stethoscope for use in the field. A Littmann Classic is more than adequate at half that cost. This one delivers high-quality breath sounds and coils neatly into the side pocket of my BDUs when not in use. Sturdy, reliable, and aesthetically pleasing, it's tough to go wrong with a Littmann Classic III.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. EstepTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for my birthday. I was so excited for my brown stethoscope with copper finish. I was slightly suspicious when I opened the box and saw a little dust on the stethoscope. I opened it to find that this didn't match the picture at all. The binaurals were a weird red-brown metal, they were scratched, and they totally clashed with the copper chestpiece. I placed the diaphragm to my chest and realized the sound quality was inferior to my MDF. At school, the Littman models have all seemed to be superior. This leads me to believe I was totally ripped off. I am returning and we will be ordering from elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli B.

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and look of this stethoscope but when it comes to using it I cannot hear anything. I have a much cheaper littmann that works better. I don't know if the one I received is just a dud or if it is this stethoscope in general.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Honestly it's a great investment.
customer_reviews.text: when I was in school I was issued a stethoscope and I couldn't hear much and thought a higher end one would be the same. I was wrong! There is a massive difference between a cheap one and a quality one! If you assess your patients and actually carry a stethoscope on you this is a must. You can hear a rat fart in a wall two blocks away with this. Honestly it's a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: I compared my stethoscope to my coworkers, which is suppose to be the same, mine is very different. Its even harder to hear out of mine. Im worried I got a knock off
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Upton

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed, I bought this last year for $107 and barely used it, kept it in it's box...when I finally took it out this semester the diaphragm fell out after actually putting it to work. I could not find it. It's poor quality compared to other littman's, I've been questioning the authenticity of it. For $107 I expected it to last long, not only after a few times of using it.
customer_reviews.author: La Rouge

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR THOSE DEEP CHESTED BREEDS
customer_reviews.text: Best stethoscope so far. Especially for Veternarians and others in the Animal Field. Even though we are paid much less too have to learn much more , as far as so many species, we DO matter. We require an even better stethoscope , due to the fact we require auscultation of very deep chested breeds, i.e. Dobermans, Great Danes. 0;). I love my Dobermans and they were the first for me to take this for a spin. Excellent sound on deep chested breeds. 0;). Came well packaged, timely, in excellent condition. Do not bother with the more costly ones , this works as well as them.
customer_reviews.author: Dobergirl77

customer_reviews.title: Not 3M Littmann product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Littmann Classic III. After using a couple weeks noticed muffled sounds, no sounds, or not clear sounds during assessments and procedures. Sounds were not clear. Have had 6 Littmann brand stethoscopes including 2 Classic III in the past. All others purchased via 3M authorized distributors. Spoke with 3M as well as met with a 3M rep and it was suggested it was not an original Littmann. Would not risk buying a product like this via this seller or Amazon unless listed as Authorized. Also if any question, return within return date. I was not thinking I would not get an original and was at a loss of my full purchase price. (I have 27 years in Emergency Medicine.)
customer_reviews.author: Yo Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I started nursing school. Honestly, it feels more expensive than my MDF, it’s heavier with a better feeling tube, but honestly I do not think it conducts sound as well as the MDF. I feel like the Littmann is such “good quality” that it picks up all the noise from my fingers while I’m holding the bell. It’s hard to explain but I just don’t like it as much and I can’t distinguish between heart sounds and artifact noises. It’s a pain when taking BPs. Was that a systolic beat or just my fingers moving over the bell? Maybe we will never know.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: 28 years ago Littman made stethoscopes that would last. Now you might get 3-4 years out of one. Something is always breaking or a diaphragm is lost. All I know is to buy another one. Unless you are a cardiologist or pulmonologist you won't need anything above a Cardiology II. Mark Bailey, MD Emergency Medicine
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, these might be a fakes.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to register mine with the Littmann "app" and it doesn't recognize the serial number. Checked out a few youtube videos for identifying fakes, but I wasn't able to figure it out exactly. Next time I would pay a little extra and get it from an authorized dealer just to be safe. Other than that it serves the purpose. I was expecting better acoustics based on reviews, but I think I prefer the sound on my cheap scope I purchased from my college book store.
customer_reviews.author: fundReviews

customer_reviews.title: Awful, dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stethoscope back in March and only started using it this semester. It does not compare to my previous Old Littmam (which I used for 7 years and was originally handed down to me). With this new Classic III, when auscultating, the sounds are faint and not clearly audible. I recommended getting a cardiac instead. The nurses where I do clinicals say it is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IS LOUDER THAN A CHEAP STETHOSCOPE
customer_reviews.text: Its heavier than my old cheap $20 stethoscope... it will slide off your neck so you have to carry it in your pocket... but man o man it sure works nice. Old smoker with COPD on 5 litres via 02 concentrator, I listened to his chest and I could clearly hear coarse, clear lungs, but the worst murmur I've ever heard. Whoosh, whoosh, whoosh. I could tell the ER Doc... we need to draw a Troponin, now! The Lab quickly called a critical value, 0.47.... we shipped the dude to the cath lab before he could code.... now that's a good stethoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure is a counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several Littman stethoscopes, this is the first time from Amazon. I bought this in preparation to have a travel one for locum work. Unfortunately, I did not try it out until this week , too late to return, and the sound quality is extremely poor or the chest piece is broken on both sides- very rarely able to hear any heart beat, much less a pediatric. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I'm still a first term nursing student, and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm still a first term nursing student, and this is my second stethoscope. I began on the cheap and bought a MDF stethoscope upon another students recommendation to save money. Upon not being able to hear a thing, I researched and found this beauty which solved all of those problems fast. Oscillating the heart, lungs, and abdominal is quite clear without much effort to listen. Save yourself the time and effort and start with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Fakes
customer_reviews.text: If you see this for a cheap price, that means it's a counterfeit and it's too good to be true. Don't fall it and try to cheap out on the price. The counterfeit I received had poor build quality which made it almost impossible to auscultate with. You and your patients deserve a quality medical tool to aid you in Dx. I contacted Littmann regards to the issues I was having; after sending in the stethoscope for repairs, they deemed it as counterfeit, asked me to report the seller, and sent me a brand new one FREE of charge. Huge difference in build quality and auscultation between a real and a fake Littmann.
customer_reviews.author: Gharib

customer_reviews.title: Dented, Dirty and Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get my stethoscope for nursing school, but when I opened the package, I immediately noticed how dirty it was. The bell was covered and is still cover in, I don't even know what, and it is also scratched around the diaphragm. I made sure to buy new because I don't want a used stethoscope...but I truly feel like they sent me a used one. The eartubes are not aligned correctly which makes the left side move forward more and it really bothers me. The sound quality is exactly like my $20 stethoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan & Jenny

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A REAL LITTMANN! I wasted my money on this garbage didn’t even fit in my ears properly! When sent back to Littmann manufacturing to repair my never used stethoscope they called to inform me it was a knockoff product! Very displeased
customer_reviews.author: allissa

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this stethoscope. I'm a RN so I use it constantly and it gets tossed in my work bag and stands up to the abuse. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because it came in the wrong color. The color I ordered is correct on the website and even on the box but when I opened it the stethoscope inside was a light pearly blue. I ordered it last minute and needed it for work so I just kept it and said screw it. I like blue in any shade anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I received this gift on Valentines Day and it was perfect. This stethoscope is 100x more gorgeous in person.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: worth to invest, nursing student, pediatric diaphram
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper one at first, however it doesnt have a pediatric diaphram which I will need in the future class. So I thought, since Im getting a new one already, why not invest in a better quality one. The quality is definitely better than the cheaper one. the tube is a lot softer, I can hear the pulse a lot clearer. Forgot to mention, Im a nursing student, and this completely fits my need. It comes with a ruber rim for the pediatric side, you can replace the pediatric diaphram with it if your professor requires.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre. Poor Sound Isolation
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are so many great reviews for this. We received a basic, low-cost stethoscope during our white coat ceremony at the beginning of medical school, which I've been using for over two years. I thought I'd upgrade it for rotations. However, even though the diaphragm seems to pick up sounds better than my previous stethoscope, it has very poor ambient noise isolation, which essentially cancels out the improved diaphragm. I'll try the cardio series, as it is supposed to have better sound isolation.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Everyday Stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure you have read most of the other reviews on this specific stethoscope and how people lose theirs all the time. Since I am sure that is all true, I still have my own and after using it a couple times, I've really grown to love it. The sound quality is really nice and does a good job of blocking out some of the outside noise. I wouldn't say that it blocks out the sound like the Cardiology IV (which is probably the best I've ever used), but for the price, I cannot complain. The stethoscope is heavier duty than the cheap plastic ones that easily break. I would say this stethoscope is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cu

customer_reviews.title: LITTMAN IS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired RN and used a Littman stethoscope for my entire career (although mine was a neonatal size stethoscope because I worked in a NICU). I purchased this one for my great niece who has been accepted to a nursing program at a state university. The quality of this stethoscope is awesome; it is well-made and unlike cheaper ones, the tubing is soft and flexible. I am positive that it will provide many years of service for her.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly E.

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color of this stethoscope and you can hear very well with it. The only part I dislike about this stethoscope is it stains very easily and nothing cleans it off. I've used it only a few times in class and it looks like I've had it for a while. I do not think I will purchase another turquoise stethoscope due to the staining.
customer_reviews.author: Allison W.

customer_reviews.title: like all her classmates
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the name. Bought it for my wife who is a nursing student. Blows away the stethoscope issued by the school! She, like all her classmates, were struggling with vitals on the cheap ones. However, with the Littmann, she was able to to get her readings without any trouble the first day. All her classmates (literally), borrowed it to do the same and claimed the exact thing. She said it was a night and day difference.
customer_reviews.author: JM VanZuiden

customer_reviews.title: So the product is great! I bought one for myself and am buying ...
customer_reviews.text: So the product is great! I bought one for myself and am buying one for my friend as a gift. The first time Amazon sent me one the box was damaged and dented. So I returned it hoping that I will receive a better one the second time. Once again the box looks like it was opened an resealed with white tape. It's frustrating when you intend to buy a new product to give to someone and it looks used. I am more disappointed with Amazon than the product itself. My friends graduation is coming up and now I don't even know if I should just keep it or return it the third time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not traditional Littman Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Unfortunately this Littmann stethoscope is not the same quality as others. I purchased this when my Cardiology Littman was stolen since I have seen other nurses with this & it seem to be reasonably priced. However, I can not hear any long sounds unless the room is absolutely silent and the patient is breathing hard enough to hyperventilate! Unacceptable from this device. I have actually been using my "cheap" stethoscope that I received as a starter nurse gift over 8 years ago & had better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT! Don’t purchase! Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this POS. This stethoscope is a complete counterfeit. I purchased this because my old Classic III was old & I needed an upgrade especially with all this COVID stuff going on so I order this one & I knew right away it was fake the second I picked it up. The tubing was larger, earpieces were larger & sticky, the stem was wayyy thicker & the auscultations abilities were terrible. I returned that thing the same damn day. SAVE YOUR MONEY & don’t buy this. Go to allheart or a legit website & purchase one there, at least then you will know it the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Defective?!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I got the amazing stethoscope that so many other received. The sound quality was not that impressive, listening to my own heart was difficult in my silent house. I can’t imagine trying to use it in a noisy hospital. Also the tubing was extremely sticky. I put in down on my bed and it was covered in fluff from my blanket. I must have got a dud. I have the classic II and was looking for an upgrade 😩
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: UMMMM....not even the right item item
customer_reviews.text: ALL I GOT WAS A BOX. NOT EVEN A STETHOSCOPE !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.R

customer_reviews.title: defective when unpacked
customer_reviews.text: I was dismayed when i unpacked this stethoscope and readied it for use to discover I could not hear any sounds transmitted (heart, breath ,bowel) Spoke to manufacturer and was given option to ask for refund or send in for free repair. Since it was brand new and Amazon has always been prompt and fair in response to any query I opted for refund. Went back to my 20year old stethoscope which lasted through multiple deployments and it still works fine. So I ordered a case for it from Amazon and my old stethoscope fits comfortably in my nice new case. Defective products do occasionally find their way into distribution so I remain a satisfied and loyal Amazon customer
customer_reviews.author: ARMYGMA

customer_reviews.title: An excellent Stethoscope!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good stethoscope, it eases me to evaluate patients, mostly by its duality on the chestpiece. I only like 2 or 3 more inches to the tube :(. I like its very excellent sound quality. I'm glad I bought it!! Pleases feel confident to probe it !!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamín

customer_reviews.title: Corgi approved!
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market and corgi approved. High quality sound, durable, and great colors! Good for the student and the professional.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in this price!
customer_reviews.text: First thing, I liked the color, purple. Since I am a nursing student, I use this product more often, in lab and in hospital when we examine patient. I had different product which i was not satisfied with and I bought this. This product is perfect in Sound, very light, and worth with that price. So Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sonypds

customer_reviews.title: Looooove my new stethoscope. I’m coming from a Littmann ...
customer_reviews.text: Looooove my new stethoscope. I’m coming from a Littmann cardiology 3 that was beyond too heavy to wear my entire shift. The sound qualify is slightly less sensitive however after being a RN for two years I find I don’t need the extra help of the cardiology. I also bought this because my cardiology is in lime yellow and has so much color transfer. I thought the hot pink wouldn’t. Well it also has it’s just not as noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Texaschick26

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stethoscope! I work at a horse hospital this is great quality and i love the color because it’s so obvious that this one is mine. I’ve had many compliments and let a few people use it to see its quality and they also love it! I love that it came with extra pieces as well as instructions and a nice case! I’m sure this will last me a long time but if it happens to get into a horrible accident I absolutely will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Couple

customer_reviews.title: Find a good quality off brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for Copd patients or pts with a “pigeon chest”. This doesn’t pick up pts lung sounds easy unless they’re really huffing. I was honestly surprised because this brand has such a good name. Maybe more hype than quality? Either way, I’d keep looking. I don’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: FamilyofLove

customer_reviews.title: I love my stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I love my stethoscope! It looks just like the display. The shipping was actuate. The only thing I disliked was the packaging... It was shipped to me in the original Littmann box and the box was not secure and anything could've happened to my item but it didn't, I received everything even the extra ear pieces and covering so I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lawan McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a littman for the past ten years and loved it. It was misplaced and I decided to order a new one. I’m not sure if their quality has gone down or if I got a knockoff. I can’t hear anything clearly. I had the same issue with my Welch Allyn products I ordered from amazon as well though so not sure if it’s the products or just poor quality control. I’m going to return this and go support a small business instead. Learning my lesson about ordering important products from amazon
customer_reviews.author: ADBaby

customer_reviews.title: Product works as Should
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's nursing program. So far she likes it and feels that it was a good choice. in addition it was the brand recommended by her program which probably means that it is a good product as this college is a public college and cannot profit from product recommendations. One recommendation, a nurse told my daughter to buy a distinct color. She said that she used to buy the black ones and other doctors and nurses would take them. I got my daughter an pink one so most males wouldn't want it and it would be distinct enough for her to know it was hers when she was working with others.
customer_reviews.author: Zenmom

customer_reviews.title: Quality worth the money
customer_reviews.text: In nursing school I went with the cheap option (and overall not that much cheaper but as they say you get what you pay for) however I was a sucker for the lifetime warranty, but after a couple of years the tubing became quite rigid and I was always struggling with the bell because it rotated too easily and the lifetime warranty didn’t apply to the tubing. The littmann is amazing! It is lightweight so putting it in my pants pocket doesn’t pull my pants down and if I put around my neck I forget it is there. The tubing is so flexible but the sound quality is shockingly superb! I wish I had this from the start.
customer_reviews.author: cmgo

customer_reviews.title: a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day at work as a medical assistant. It is very accurate and reliable. The quality is great. I recommend this product for anyone working in the medical field - the PAs I work with have this one too. Side note: I was not careful with it and threw it around too much, so the plastic diaphragm piece cracked. I called the company (Littmann) and they sent me a new piece for free within a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Rosasar

customer_reviews.title: Best Stethoscope!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself when I started Nursing School. Beautiful color and amazing stethoscope. Clarity is perfect. It lasted me all though Nursing School and when I started my first nursing job. I’ve since upgraded to a Cardiology. This Littmann Classic iii is just perfect though! Great investment. Live Littmanns!
customer_reviews.author: C.Bengs

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for nursing school
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eyeballing this for a while and I’m so happy I bought it! I’m a nursing student and I was really struggling to hear heart and lung sounds in clinical with the stethoscope from our kit. I was beginning to think I wasn’t going to get it, then I got this. I can hear things so much clearer and heard my first murmur. I have a lot to learn but this is helping me get there!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the medical field and this is my first stethoscope I have had. This is working perfectly for what I use it for, which is just vitals. I can totally recommend it for use for that. I ordered dark blue and it is true to color, not heavy, and came packaged to protect. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I seen a few reviews that suggested that this would be way too advanced for those whom are first responders but it actually is perfect! Being in a riding Ambulance it gets fairly loud & I need to be able to hear a clear heart beat and this is absolutely perfect! Considering the price, it is also fairly cheap compared to other Littman Stethoscopes. I convinced a few people to order as well & they do not regret it. I also love the fact it came with extra ear pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyne

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered !
customer_reviews.text: Yup this is what my sawbones wears around his neck, exact same thing. These are not cheap by no means at all and this was actually (rated way higher than the Master) was. So I spoke to my sawbones and he said this is his #1 choice. Thank goodness this was on sale and I got it. Being a disaster First Responder, and working in the industrial nursing business part time/as needed this will pay for it self many times over. I love it !!!! Yup, it's just what the doctor ordered ! (literally)
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: My 1st seth. S3 is Very loud and very clear sounding
customer_reviews.text: My first stetho,I love it. 1st semester of nursing program is hard enough, Do yourself a favor and buy these before your latbs and clinicals start. I was using my colleges seth and I was having a hard time during labs finding the arteries and lung lobes sounds. I thought I couldn't find the proper locations, but after I bought this seth series 3 I have no problem hearing lungs and main arteries' sounds. It turns out I was putting the bell and diaphragm over the correct areas of the body, but the colleges' seth were trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mikesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: So after 12 years I had to retire my first Littman from nursing school. I’ve been searching and found the perfect one with this Choc/copper Littman classic 3! I was worried because some have posted problems with this color, where thr copper looks red/orange and different than the bell but I took the risk and with my Amazon discount points, I saved $25! Well, I’m glad to report it came within 2 days, in a brand new box and looking beautiful! 😍 LOL! I posted pictures! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: pinkynbd

customer_reviews.title: Not a great color
customer_reviews.text: The stethoscope itself works as it should. The color is more of a highlighter neon yellow/neon jaundice color. The picture definitely looks more like a bright yellow color. I wear dark scrubs & apparently the dark color of the scrubs rubs off on the neon yellow tubing, and it does not come off! I have used this stethoscope for a total of ten 12 hour shifts and it already looks bad. Would never choose this color again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Received a used, sticky, fake stethoscope.
customer_reviews.text: It came dirty and extremely sticky as if it’s been used by children, I have attempted to clean it multiple time and it’s still sticky... it never came with the extra ear pieces or bell covers, another indication that it has been used. I’m not going through the hassle of returning it and I needed a new stethoscope. upon further reading of reviews. If you want a real littmann you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stethoscope!! This is my 3rd Littmann and this is by far my favorite. I work on mother baby postpartum and it works perfectly with the dual sides... I only need this one stethoscope for the mom's and babies :) super light weight and I love the all black.. it really stands out and matches our red and black uniforms perfectly. You will not be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great, but NOT yellow!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one with yellow tubing because it would be easiest to see in the wilderness (I'm a wilderness EMT). It's perfect for its utility but it is NOT even close to yellow. It's an apple green. One of the worst colors for the backcountry. So disappointed! Wishing now I'd ordered a different color, but all of our equipment is yellow so I thought it would be a good match. Again, the stethoscope works perfectly. The color is a wilderness disaster!
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to buy a new one because of the attachment to my old one but the old one's tubing finally cracked from age and while I could still hear it was time to retire her. Then I saw this one and said that's the one! I closed my eyes and hit the place order button and it came. Looks nice and the quality is exactly what Littmann is known for. I am not disappointed at all. As a matter of fact, I will be buying another one in this new year. Thank you Littmann for your continued quality and pricing.
customer_reviews.author: CindyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second stethoscope that I've bought in my 16 yrs as an RN. Littmann is a great company and they do a nice job making good quality stethoscopes. This one was a lot more pricey than my first (Littmann lightweight II S.E.), but it has great sound and seems to be of a little better quality material. Love the carribean blue tubing and the rainbow metal features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is pricier than some of the others out there, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two other stethoscopes within the same week, one of them a MDF and the other the Litteman II. The MDF literally picked up no sound. I thought it was just me, but my coworkers had the same problem. The Litteman II had very little sound, so I opted to try the Litteman III and it works great! Working in healthcare, this is a crucial element in a stethoscope to have solid sound. The design of this one has a nice personality with the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Te-Te

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My niece that is n R.N. recommended that I buy a Littmann stethoscope and I am so pleased that I did. My husband has had a severe case of pneumonia, and I have chronic lung problems with one having a clot. I had an inexpensive stethoscope that I only used to take manual blood pressure checks, but I could barely hear a heartbeat with the cheap one. It is amazing what I can hear with this Littmann Classic III Monitoring stethoscope. I highly recommend this brand. I got the order in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: LCLTx

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great sound, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I was able to use my HSA account to purchase this. I am a CMA and work at and urgent care, so I take manual bp on every patient. Before my Littman, I had an Adscope that I got when I was in school; it worked fine, but all the CMAs I know were going to the Littman Classic III, and for good reason. Had a little trouble hearing at first, but once I switched the ear tips it made all the difference. Hands down best steth for an MA or even a nurse that doesn't wanna shell out the cash for a Cardiology.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Nursing School
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently a third year nursing student and need a really good stethoscope for clinical. Everyone talks so highly of Littmann so i thought i would get one. The stethoscope was pricy but so worth it. I love the quality of the stethoscope it allows me to hear everything clearly. I’m always wiping it down with alcohol whips and the color hasn’t warn away at all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yennifer

customer_reviews.title: Name brand recognition
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product's construction is superb, however, the performance is wanting. I hear my patient's breath sounds better with the old cheap stethoscope I was using before. Maybe it's because of the size of the diaphragm or the membrane itself. I've been a nurse for 20+ years and this is my first Littmann. I'm somewhat disappointed since I've seen all these 4 star reviews. Maybe its just this particular stethoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Erniel

customer_reviews.title: This Littmann is amazing. I am about halfway through my veterinary assistant ...
customer_reviews.text: This Littmann is amazing. I am about halfway through my veterinary assistant course and at the start of the program they said w would need stethoscope. I was super concerned about being able to hear though it because I have been diagnosed with tinnitus in both ears. Thankfully I found the Classic III in a scubs store and I was about to try it out and then find it for a cheaper price here on Amazon. I have ZERO issues with being able to hear heart-rates with this stethoscope. It is very well made and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: aj_gunsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Diaphragm falls off
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this stethoscope for a few months and the diaphragm falls off constantly. Considering the Harvey stethoscope I had for years, I'm a bit disappointed to say the least. Embarrassing when it falls off and you are in the middle of an exam. Not easy to replace with ring either. Seems cheap. You had one job to do! Hate that I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: NicNat

customer_reviews.title: Get this over the Cardiology IV
customer_reviews.text: Such a good price for such a good stethoscope. I also have the cardiology iv I found that this has just as good if not better sound quality and isn’t as heavy. I spent a ton of money on the cardiology iv and I should’ve just gone with this one in the first place it’s such a good price and such a good stethoscope truly! I do have to say the cardiology iv is nice to have an adult and a pediatric side but overall save your money and get this!! You could get 2 for the price of one cardiology iv!
customer_reviews.author: Bren M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my clinicals and the price was great considering what other medical places/websites were selling it for. ($100+) I got this for around $78 and for a Littmann it’s a good price. I chose the color based on the price and purple/lavender was the cheapest. Others were selling for around $80 to $90 which was still cheaper than all of the other websites. Some reviews say it’s a knockoff but I don’t believe it. It came in a Littmann box and had an insert with extra ear pieces and drum parts. It’s good quality and works great!
customer_reviews.author: panda14

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker
customer_reviews.text: Love but color is darker than it appears in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Q.

customer_reviews.title: Bought one, used it after a few months and the Adult side produced no sound
customer_reviews.text: I like this stethoscope, but after a few months, the adult side wasn't working. The child side produced sound when applied to a chest and also when it was tapped by a finger. But this was not the case for the adult side. I had assumed that it would last for a lot longer than that because it is 80 bucks. I want to buy another one for nursing school, but if it is going to be unreliable maybe I should buy a cheaper one... :( Not sure...
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. McKeen

customer_reviews.title: There's good news and bad news...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new nursing student and read reviews on the quality of a stethoscope is a big deal when it comes to auscultating heart/lung sounds. So glad I chose this one because sounds are crystal clear and would highly advise anyone to buy. The only other comment is that the packaging was not brand new with plastic wrap so I suspect it was opened prior to arrival. I swapped out the ear buds and sanitized the hose, diaphragm and bell just in case. All in all a great buy, trust the number of reviews and star rating on this one!
customer_reviews.author: JB reviews

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t match up
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with a Littman stethoscope. They are, hands down, the best in the game. I am a RN and have the cardiology III and I bought my bf the classic in “dark olive green” for EMT school. The color pictured is an OD green that really pops against the smoke finish. Unfortunately, the one received is definitely not the same color pictured. It’s a dark hunter green that is very hard to distinguish from the smoke finish. It’s still a very sleek looking piece, but we were looking for that OD green tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a littmann stethoscope for 10+ years, same model, that worked very well. Sadly, it was stolen. I bought this as a replacement. One of the metal tubes is twisted out of alignment. However, even when I have both earpieces in place I have to squeeze the metal tubes into my ears with one hand and manipulate the bell with my other hand to be able to hear ANYTHING. Unacceptable. Just bought a $20 BP cuff kit with a no-name sprague stethoscope in it that works 10x better. This is a bargain for a littmann, but only if it works. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mark williams

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stethoscope. Lighter than my old one but definitely still has potential weight, especially if carried for extended periods. It's on the shorter end, but that doesnt impede on its function. Love the color... usually dont splurge on stuff like this and the price is a bit high for a stethoscope but figured I use it, I'm going to continue needing it in my nursing career, and you get what you pay for! Ear pieces are comfortable and sound quality is great. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m in nursing school and I did a lot of research online before buying these. I don’t have a lot of experience to compare these to but I did buy a pair out of my school bookstore and I had to return them because I couldn’t hear. So far these are great very comfy in my ears which was important to me and I can hear well. Relative to the others I found online it seems like these are a great value as well. I went with the navy to match my scrubs but the fact there are so many color options is cool too
customer_reviews.author: RachiZilcha

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my husband. A nurse recommended I buy one because the automatic B.P. machine is always off on it's calibration and giving me a false reading. My husband was recently out of the hosp. and he had virtual visit with the dr. so, I needed to take his B.P. myself. Home health nurse had me practice how to use it and it wasn't hard. She said it was a good one.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for nursing school and am impressed by the easiness of finding the heart beat and listening to lung sounds. I'm amazed at how much you can hear. The color looks a little faded but that may be just because of how it was folded in the packaging. Comes with extra ear pieces and rings. Recommended by nurses for all beginners. (I messaged Littman to verify distribution and Littman says Amazon is an authorized dealer even though it's not listed as one on the littman website.)
customer_reviews.author: LucidWays

customer_reviews.title: worth the price tag for nursing school
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stethoscope for nursing school and it was well worth the investment. A couple of my classmates went for less expensive options and have told me after using mine that the sound is clearer and more audible than theirs, and they intend to return theirs and get a Litttmann. I also love the color! I went out on a limb and got the brown one ("chocolate") because I loved the copper earpieces and chestpiece. It's unique and different from all of my classmates. I love that it stands out and is eye catching in a good way. Have received many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: always loved littmann
customer_reviews.text: I bought a littmann stethoscope when I graduated from nursing school in 1978. Recently started in another field and needed a stethoscope again for my new position. I am not sorry I purchased this. It is comfortable in my ears, lightweight enough to be comfortable around my neck or in my pocket, I hear lung and heart sounds, abdominal sounds well and for a all-around scope, this one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool for medical professionals!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the rainbow finish chest piece all black one. I was on the fence for a little while about which one I wanted. It was between one that cost less and this one. I decided to take the plunge and get this one. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase! The rainbow finish is beautiful and this brand is quality! I love my stethoscope! Starting nursing school this Aug and I can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best stethescope
customer_reviews.text: I got a stethescope when going to school but it was so low quality you could barely hear the heartbeat when listening on dogs. I seen some student with this brand so i decided to order. Im so glad i did. With the first test on my own dog i could hear VERY clearly and easily. Definitly invest in this brand. It will be well worth it. There is no trying to detect sound with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I had not bought a stethoscope in over 20 yrs. Finally, mine lost a screw, so I needed to get a new one. Amazing how light it is, and how to get two different sound qualities by either holding light or more firm against the patient. I wish I would of upgraded to a new one long ago. As you get older, do not expect the hearing to ever get better. So improvment of hearing heartsounds prominently wasa a vaery nice surprise. I highly recommend this model. Lot's of colors allows one to pick a color no one else has, so someone does not accidentally walk away from my stethoscope.
customer_reviews.author: mjOregon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this is really good!!!! The only problem for me is that the bell is so heavy it sometimes falls to one side and I have to pull it over multiple times throughout the day. It is still pretty light weight and the good definitely outweighs the bad. It is very sleek and comfortable on the ears!!! Sound is always clear and loud which is what really matters. A really good price as well - most retailers ask for over $100!! It was packaged great and came with extra supplies as well as an informational booklet if it’s your first one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The (old) Cardiology III has now been renamed Cardiology IV.
customer_reviews.text: “The Cardiology III has now been replaced with the new and improved Littmann Cardiology IV Stethoscope” Not realizing the difference, I bought a Classic III to replace a Cardiology III that I bought 7 years ago while in medical school (mine was mistakenly discarded due to Covid cleaning). The Classic III is smaller, lighter, and definitely less sensitive acoustically. The Classic is probably fine but I liked my old stethoscope so I returned it and purchased the Cardiology IV, which seems nearly identical to my previous Cardiology III.
customer_reviews.author: Patty B

customer_reviews.title: Can hear the ticker...
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. It's soothing in color and more importantly, I can hear clear and crisp sounds. I'm not a stethoscope expert, I'm in EMT school and on my local fire department. The one we have on our rescue truck I cannot hear cats fighting. With this one, the sound is so clear I can make out lung sounds and how hungry they are before the pt even knows! I didn't give it 5 stars because I'm sure there is something that I'm not thinking of that can be improved on, but pleased with product and timelines of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MermaidInTheWoods

customer_reviews.title: 💉💊Hubby got for work💊💉
customer_reviews.text: After new cross training he found hinself Having to do bp and having a harder time hearing with the Ones they used.. One person suggested shorter ones.. And many said this is the brand to go for! He's quite happy and said although pricier they were Definitely worth it! Hmm... If only they made a " hear what your just said" device lol Came well protected in a stiff box 🐈🐈🐈🐈🐈
customer_reviews.author: 🐆😺MeoW😸🐆

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Bonus...it's so pretty! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was alittle wary of purchasing a Littman stethoscope on Amazon. But I'm glad I did. I am a vet tech and this stethoscope is awesome. The pediatric side is great for neonates and the little pets. Bonus...it is SO pretty! I almost want to wear it on my neck as just an accessory. It has a good weight but not too heavy for all day wear. Love it and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for getting this to me before I had to work! My 10+ year old littman tubing cracked on friday at work (I'm a nurse) and it worked but I was afraid it would break completely. Now I have a replacement. The tubing on this one is so flexible and more comfortable to wear when I'm not using it. The sound quality is great and I am so impressed with how fast this got to me! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana225

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from matte black finish
customer_reviews.text: Previous one with stainless steel finish lasted for about 8 years and worked great until I lost it. Purchased a matte black finish one to replace it and after just about a month of regular use (paramedic) one of the earpieces snapped in half rendering it useless. Wondering if the matte finish compromises the integrity of the metal? Bottom line, wish I had just gotten the stainless steel finish again as I now have to spend twice as much and purchase another anyway. Tried to send seller an email and got a response that their email address wasn't valid...so customer service was non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Thank you littman
customer_reviews.text: Been using it throughout my nursing school journey, so far it has been great for listening to heart and lung sounds. I’ve used it on patients, myself, and friends and have disinfected it between uses and it still looks great. My biggest worry was that the disinfectant solutions would break down the paint/plastic over time but nope I was wrong ! I say it’s worth the investment. Thanks Littman!
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Great backup stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: Wife's primary stethoscope was in for cleaning and new tubing. Repair took longer then normal so we ordered this as a backup. She said it did the job and performed well, not quite as good as her cardiology stethoscope but was far better than the "loaner" the hospital provided and is good enough to use as a backup in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable to use in the real world
customer_reviews.text: After borrowing one at the hospital one day, I switched to this from my previous (and much heavier) cardiology scope a few months ago. Can honestly say that the difference in sound quality/ability to hear clearly is minimal if present at all, and not having that extra weight dangling from my neck all day is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Littmann Stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: My wife received her very first stethoscope from her CNA certification class that she tried to use for her nursing school. She could not even hear a dummy's heartbeat with it during one of her exams and needed something better if she wanted to pass the program. She borrowed her teacher's Littmann stethoscope and was surprised by the difference in quality and sound that we immediately bought one as well. She has used this in all her classes and at work for nearly one and a half years. She won't be using any other brand. Her first stethoscope went into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: JS619

customer_reviews.title: SO SO DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst stethoscope I have ever had. It’s extremely hard to hear sounds. I have let two other nurse use it to check just to make sure it wasn’t me and they both said they could barely hear anything.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worked great In the beginning but surprisingly didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Had my stethoscope for 2.5 years never left it in the car never exposed it to heat change or anything like that but my tubing is cracking and has a deep crack in it which makes it more difficult to hear which is becoming a problem. Definitely disappointed was hoping it would last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this was a failure. It was twisted and didn't sit in my ears anywhere near as well as it should. Attempted adjustments did nothing. Sound was terrible. Extremely disappointed as this should have been the exact thing I had previously (and loved) needed to replace as my original scope was lost on a call.
customer_reviews.author: Callie R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stethoscope to replace one I had used for almost 10 years. I am very disappointed that in two years it is already falling apart. The diaphragm won’t stay on and have had to put tape on it to keep from losing it (not very sanitary) until I buy a replacement. I have had a couple of littmanns and never had such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: As usual with a Littman, the sound quality is excellent. It is very light weight. I don't even notice it around my neck. The chocolate tubing and copper finish have a fresh look and are very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USED WAX filled and Oily tubing
customer_reviews.text: This is how I received my product today. I paid 100$ for a used, wax filled stethoscope. It cleaned it with alcohol because I needed this stethoscope for nursing school already but this is cruel. I was not told I will be sent a used item. Im disgusted. I never write bad reviews about an item. This is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: wrong color, but works well as labeled
customer_reviews.text: works well. i am disappointed that i ordered a lavender one as showed in the picture and described as lavender tube. i got a black tube. the item does work wonderfully though and makes blood pressures easier . just wish it was the lavender one. really dissappoited with that. and i paid extra for a lavender tube to get a black tube.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gumlaw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Littmann Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you’re in the medical field, you know the Littmann name. They are well known as the top of the line and everyone uses them. Not because it’s a name brand. It is actually because they are actually amazing stethoscopes all around! This one is no different, and it performs very well in the tasks it’s needed for. If you are looking for a great stethoscope this is a perfect option for you.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: 3M Littmann Classic III Monitoring Stethoscope, Black Edition Chestpiece, Black Tube, 27 Inch, 5803
product_meta.description:
Color:Black Tube| Chestpiece Style:Black Matte-Finish Chestpiece

Love your stethoscope

The compact and sensitive Littmann Classic III stethoscope is the perfect instrument for clinicians who monitor and assess children or adults in non-critical environments. Manufactured with strong yet lightweight materials for hours of comfortable use.

Education at your fingertips.

Get exclusive training content on your mobile device that will help you improve your auscultation skills and use your stethoscope more effectively. The 3M Littmann Learning Institute App includes self-paced lessons with heart and lung sounds, patient scenarios to help improve your diagnostic thinking, self-tests to track your progress, a sound library, and more.

Get the app and start training today!

Here’s how:

Find

Find the Littmann Learning Institute App in the App Store or Google Play.

Download

Download the free app to your mobile device.

Unlock

Enter the serial number, found on your 3M Littmann Stethoscope chestpiece, or voucher code to unlock unique educational content.



MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Not Applicable
feature_bullets: Monitor and assess a wide range of patients
Detect normal and abnormal sounds and rhythms
Useful in non critical care environments such as a medical office, general ward, OB/GYN, ambulatory clinic or urgent care
Open bell stays clear of dirt and debris by covering it with the small diaphragm
Fun and vibrant; match color and finish to your personality

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
